H0.text: Which was the only country to win two silver medals and no other medals at the 2008 Summer Olympics? (clue - both medals were won in men's sprint events). Jamaican

H1.text: Which was the only country to win two silver medals and no other medals at the 2008 Summer Olympics? (clue - both medals were won in men's sprint events). American

H2.text: Which was the only country to win two silver medals and no other medals at the 2008 Summer Olympics? (clue - both medals were won in men's sprint events). Canadian

H3.text: Which was the only country to win two silver medals and no other medals at the 2008 Summer Olympics? (clue - both medals were won in men's sprint events). Trinidadian

A4.text: silver medals were won in the men's 100 meters and in the men's 4x100 meters relay.

A5.text: Jamaica was stripped of their gold medal due to doping charges and Trinidad and Tobago was awarded the gold.
